valentines.valentineMessage: Don't ever think I fell for you, or fell over you. I didn't fall in love, I rose in it.
Love can change a person the way a parent can change a baby â€” awkwardly, and often with a great deal of mess.
I've only ever said 'I love you' to two men my entire life, Stone Cold Steve Austin and a guy in a dark club who I mistook for Stone Cold Steve Austin.
True love does have the power to redeem but only if we are ready for redemption. Love saves us only if we want to be saved.
valentines.valentineSource: bell hooks, 'All About Love: New Visions'

valentines.valentineMessage: Love in action is a harsh and dreadful thing compared with love in dreams.
